br.strong: COVID-19 Update #2 Video from Supt. Mann (4-7-2020)

span.span: Please let me be the first to welcome you to Delaware Community School Corporation. We are delighted to have you research our district. Delaware Community School Corporation, or Delcom, is located in Delaware County just north of Muncie, Indiana. We serve nearly 2,600 students throughout our five school buildings: Albany Elementary, Eaton Elementary, Royerton Elementary, Delta Middle School, and Delta High School.

p.span: We of course serve students within our residential boundaries, but nearly 12% of our student population live outside our school district. Delcom boasts a long and proud tradition of putting students first and maintains a culture that promotes student safety, academic rigor and student engagement in various after school activities.

Please take the time to research our entire district by visiting individual building websites or feel free to click on this link for provide historical data pertaining to our school district. Student data will continue to be a driving factor in shaping our community of excellence.
On behalf of a very supportive school board of trustees, I say, “WELCOME TO DELCOM.” Feel free to call for inquiries and please let us know how we can better serve your needs.

div.div: Final day of school will be May 8.
